class DataFitProcess[source]

DataFitProcess(n:int=None, start:bool=False, data_fit=None, agent:BaseAgent=None, learner_cls:Learner=None, experience_block:ExperienceBlock=None, cancel:Event=None) :: Process

Process objects represent activity that is run in a separate process

The class is analogous to threading.Thread

class MultiProcessTfm[source]

MultiProcessTfm(n:int=1, n_processes:int=1, maxsize:int=1, process_cls=DataFitProcess) :: Transform

Delegates (__call__,decode,setup) to (encodes,decodes,setups) if split_idx matches

AsyncExperienceBlock[source]

AsyncExperienceBlock(experience_block, agent=None, learner_cls=None, data_fit=None, n_processes=1, n=200, bs=1, maxsize:int=1, process_cls=DataFitProcess)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
env='MountainCar-v0'

block=AsyncExperienceBlock(
    experience_block=partial(ExperienceBlock,a=0,seed=0,dls_kwargs={'bs':1,'num_workers':0,'verbose':False,'indexed':True,'shuffle_train':False}),
    n_processes=1,
    n=200
)
blk=IterableDataBlock(blocks=block,splitter=FuncSplitter(lambda x:False))
dls=blk.dataloaders([env]*5)

for i,x in enumerate(dls[0]):
#     print(x)
    if i==0:test_eq(str(x[0]['s']),str(tensor([[[-0.5891,  0.0000]]]).double()))

test_eq(str(x[0]['s']),str(tensor([[[-0.7148,  0.0039]]]).double()))
test_eq(i,199)

resetting
resetting
resetting
